doc.title: Leaving the Land of Loss
doc.plot: Motivating and inspiring stories of two real people and the challenges they overcame. Regardless how bad and dark your life is, things will get better if you accept help and begin to help yourself. Don't allow a Loss of self through addiction, job lay off or failed relationship to loss of a home, loved one or limb, debilitate you! You're not alone and the help you need is closer than you know!
